post_content:
We dive when YOU want to!¬†Cane Bay Dive Shop is a Five Star PADI facility that offer the most extensive dive schedule on St. Croix! Beach, Boat, Night, Drift, Pier, Wreck, or Nitrox dives are available every day, all to your schedule. Cane Bay Dive Shop¬†is know for diving the undisputed 'wall diving capital' of all the Virgin Islands. The wall runs from Salt River to Hamm's Bluff, starting at a depth of 20 feet and descending to well below the safe recreational diving limit. Enjoy fantastic shore diving, or 10 minute boat rides to many awe inspiring sites along the wall. Snorkeling and sightseeing along the picturesque North Shore for 2 1/2 hours is an experience not to be missed for families with non-divers. Now available: Spectacular savings on dive packages with cottages, resorts, homes and small hotels.

 

 

 

 

 

Location: Frederiksted, West End
Phone: (800) 338-3843 | (340) 718-9913 Visit Website Services Hotel & Dive Packages Private Charters Events Dive Sites Services

Cane Bay Dive shop (CBDS) is a full service dive center offering an array of diving, gear, and scuba certification services. Here are some of the more popular services offered by CBDS:

‚Ä¢ Boat Diving
‚Ä¢ Guided Shore Diving
‚Ä¢ Hotel and Dive Packages
‚Ä¢ Snorkeling Tours
‚Ä¢ Private Charters
‚Ä¢ Learn to Scuba Dive
‚Ä¢ Scuba Refresher Course
‚Ä¢ Advanced Diver, Rescue & Specialty Courses
‚Ä¢ First Aid & CPR Training
‚Ä¢ E-Learning
‚Ä¢ Dive Master, Assistant Instructor (AI) and the Open Water Scuba Instructor (OWSI) Certifications
‚Ä¢ Dive Gear Rentals & Sales
‚Ä¢ Gear Servicing

Hotel & Dive Packages ¬†

Whether you want to go boat diving or shore diving, CBDS offers several different packages to meet your diving needs.

Boat Diving Packages:

‚Ä¢ 6 Tank Boat Package - $360
‚Ä¢ 8 Tank Boat Package - $460
‚Ä¢ 10 Tank Boat Package - $540

Tank & Gear Rentals:

Get more diving for less with the CBDS 12-Tank Rental special offer - get a 12 Tank Rental Card Package for $105. Tank rentals are for 24 hours. Add weights for an extra $5. You can also rent a complete scuba or snorkel gear setup and any extra items you might need for the day, or ask about their weekly rate.

Hotel/Diving Packages:

If you're traveling to St. Croix for the diving, CBDS offers hotel and diving packages as well.

Private Charters

Schedule your private group trip aboard USCG IBIS, a 36' Newton dive boat. CBDS offers customized dive and snorkel charters, so you can dive the sites you want and not have to deal with a crowd. Choose from full or half day charters.

Call CBDS at (340) 772-0715 for more details.

Events

CBDS hosts many different kinds of events for all types and levels of divers including:

‚Ä¢ Wine Cruise
‚Ä¢ Junior Dive Day
‚Ä¢ Ladies Dive & Wine
‚Ä¢ ECO Dives
‚Ä¢ Night Boat Dives
‚Ä¢ IDC and Dive Master

Visit the CBDS website for upcoming events and details.

Dive Sites

St. Croix offers diverse diving for all levels of divers. Dive underwater canyons, the Frederiksted Pier, The Wall at Cane Bay, shipwrecks and lots of beautiful coral reefs.

post_content:
[wpbb post:title]

Get to know St. Croix's underwater wildlife-Turtles, Eels, Sting Rays, Eagle Rays, Manta Rays, Dolphins, and even Humpback Whales-with St. Croix's original PADI 5-Star IDC Center! Michelle Pugh, a member of the Women Divers Hall of Fame, opened Dive Experience in 1983 and has the most experienced dive staff on the island. Diver safety, combined with fun and preservation of the marine environment are their primary concerns.

Location: Christiansted
Phone: (340) 773-3307 | (800) 235-9047 Visit Website Experience Video Location Services Retail Experience

Michelle Pugh, a 45-year resident of St. Croix, learned to dive in Los Angeles while in high school and hasn't stopped since!

In 1992, along with Jacques Cousteau, she was inducted into the Platinum Pro 5000 through SSI. In 2004, she was inducted into the Women Divers Hall of Fame for being the first woman to dive with killer whales in the wilds of Canada, the first American woman to teach diving in Moscow, Russia and for establishing the mooring system on St. Croix to protect the coral reefs. Michelle was also given the SBDC and Congressional Award for Entrepreneurial Success for Dive Experience.¬†

Sam Halvorson, Captain, Instructor, Dive Master, and Videographer, has been on board for 29 years. He knows the reefs like the back of his hand. His videos are his favorite souvenir!

Michelle, who's made over 10,000 dives on St. Croix, is the only dive center owner that actually dives most everyday--guiding lots of customers by request. While developing the dive mooring sites, she has explored most St. Croix reefs and walls. Michelle has also traveled the world just to dive-from the East coast of the US from Florida to Rhode Island, the West Coast from Canada to Mexico, The Red Sea, Australia, Solomon Islands, Borneo, Philippines, the Antarctic, the Galapagos Islands and most of the Caribbean Islands!

Dive Experience is St. Croix's first dive operator and the first PADI 5-star IDC Center, teaching Diving from novice to professional instructors. Located at Kings Alley on the boardwalk, their USCG-licensed dive boat is steps away on the boardwalk.

Video Location
With a location right on the Christiansted boardwalk, it's literally steps from their dive boat, and that much closer to getting you face-to-face with the magnificent marine-life that diving in St. Croix has to offer!
 

Services
  • Diver Training - Beginner to Instructor
  • Dive Equipment Retail & Rentals
  • Daily Boat Dives
  • Night Dives
  • Lion Fish Hunts
  • Snorkel Trips

Retail

Dive Experience isn't just for diving; featuring the largest selection of Reef sandals on island, and basic snorkel equipment to professional diving gear from trusted brands, like Aqualung, hats, towels, tees, everything you need to dive, or even hang out by the pool, can be found here. Grab a beer or soft drink (sold in-shop) and have a look! And don't miss Sam Halvorson's watercolor prints for sale as well!

one of Sam Halvorson's gorgeous watercolor prints

You'll also enjoy...

"}}}} /-->

The "Friendliest Dive Shop on Earth".¬†¬†Our staff makes all the difference.¬† It all looks the same underwater, fantastic if you're diving St. Croix, but it's what happens on the surface that sets us apart.¬† Check out our over 1,000 TripAdvisor reviews.¬† Two locations, Christiansted and Frederiksted, and two custom US Coast Guard inspected dive boats that dive ALL of the moored dive sites along St. Croix's north and west shores.¬† St. Croix is the only place in the Caribbean to dive a wall, a reef, a wreck, and a pier, and we dive them all every day of the year.

 

 

 

 

 

Location: Christiansted | Frederiksted
Phone:¬†(340) 773-5994 Visit Website About Us Services Courses Video Map About Us

St. Croix Ultimate Bluewater Adventures (SCUBA) opened on July 15, 1998. Longtime island residents Ed and Molly met while working for the same airline, a Caribbean subsidiary of Eastern Airlines. After the demise of Eastern, Molly and Ed didn't want to leave the island that they loved so much. Ed was a NAUI Instructor (Molly was his first student) and Molly had retail background from college so they started working for what was then the oldest dive shop on the island, V.I. Divers, Ltd.

SCUBA started out with a small retail dive shop in Christiansted on St. Croix and no boat or dive equipment. Within the first six months V.I. Divers, Ltd., sold the diving equipment, compressor and rental gear to Molly and Ed and the dive boat Reliance was soon added.

In October of 2017 SCUBA added a second location in Frederiksted on the west shore of the island. While they had always operated a west shore dive boat the addition of a full service dive shop has been great.

Services

We have two custom dive boats that dives all of the moored dive sites along St. Croix's north and west shores.

Our dive boat Reliance dives the walls (it's up to 13,200' deep) and reefs (the largest living reef of any Caribbean island and the second longest barrier reef in the Caribbean), from our dive shop in Christiansted.

Our dive boat Scuba Dos dives the 5 wrecks, reefs, and the famous Frederiksted Pier on the west shore of the island. The boat departs from directly off of the cruise ship pier making it extremely convenient for divers arriving by cruise ship.

We also dive Buck Island National Monument on Wednesday afternoons (one-tank) in cooperation with Caribbean Sea Adventures. We use their boat and Captain and staff the boat with your dive crew.

Courses

  • Discover Scuba Diving
  • Open Water Certification
  • Scuba Diver
  • Advanced Open Water Certification
  • Adventure Diver
  • Master Scuba Diver
  • Rescue Diver
  • Emergency First Response
  • Emergency Oxygen Provider
  • PADI Specialties Classes
  • Technical Courses
  • Professional Courses

Video Map

At Sweet Bottom Dive Center we offer a safe and memorable dive experience with 'over the top' customer service. Located at both Cane Bay and Carambola Beach Resort, we are a PADI 5 Star Instructor Development Center specializing in personalized service including guided SCUBA and snorkeling tours, extensive quality training and certifications, and a retail sales center offering a full range of scuba and snorkeling supplies for all levels of water enthusiasts. Dive from shore or by boat, and try the many types of diving St. Croix has to offer including reef, pier and wall diving. At Sweet Bottom we offer a level of safety and integrity you won't find anywhere else!

Location: North Shore
Phone:¬†(340) 773-3483 Visit Website About Us Services Diving St. Croix Video Map About Us We are a family owned and operated business specializing in personalized scuba diving experiences.¬†We (Mark and Laura Linse)¬†have been involved in the dive industry since 2010,¬†and took over ownership¬†of Sweet Bottom Dive Center¬†in 2015.¬† We prefer to see our divers enjoy every minute of their trip and¬†that's¬†why we will take care of the assembly, disassembly, briefings, compass headings, locating all the critters, the gear cleanup, and logistics for your dives.¬† All you need is to show up, breathe, and enjoy!¬†¬†Our group sizes¬†are kept¬†small to allow divers of all different skill levels to have the best possible trip and to feel like they are within their own personal limitations.¬† Our scheduling process is done on a first come first serve basis, but we always strive to accommodate all divers as best as we can. We hear weekly that our guests are so pleased that we were able to work around their schedule. ¬† Sweet Bottom Dive Center is proud of its partnerships with the Carambola Beach Resort at Davis Bay and The Landing Beach Resort at Cane Bay. Both locations are part of the famous St. Croix Wall. "We look forward to bringing an awesome diving experience to all of our guests that visit the North Shore." Stop in and say hello. ¬† Cane Bay Location at The Landing Beach Resort ¬† Our Cane Bay location is right across the street from Cane Bay, one of St. Croix's most popular shore dives. Our state of the art dive facility offers many features and amenities including an air-conditioned classroom for our IDC and dive certification students. We keep our certification class sizes and Discover Scuba experiences small (much smaller than PADI requirements) in order to allow for one-on-one attention from the instructors, and to ensure quality and safety. The storage room for our scuba rental gear is dehumidified, and the rental gear is replaced every three years, plus we offer a dehumidified storage room for visiting dive guests to store their gear overnight (no packing wet gear for the trip home!) ¬† ¬† Davis Bay Location at Carambola Beach Resort ¬† Sweet Bottom Dive Center's original location at Carambola Beach Resort is now open.¬† With fresh paint, new and improved lighting, new store fixtures and all new rental equipment, Sweet Bottom Dive Center will be ready to serve its guests. Sweet Bottom Dive Center will provide a full concierge dive service at the resort. As guests enter the guard gate, Sweet Bottom staff will be notified and meet them in the parking lot to help them with their dive equipment, bringing it to the dive center via a golf cart. Once the equipment is set up on the equipment bench, the equipment will be transported down the beach to the dive site entry point. When the dive is completed, Sweet Bottom staff will recover the equipment, it will be transported back to the dive center for cleaning and drying. "We want our guests to feel special when they dive with our operation." Guests are welcome to stay for lunch or some relaxing beach time at beautiful Davis Bay. Sweet Bottom Dive Center at the Carambola Beach Resort will offer its guest all of the same activities that they do at their Cane Bay location. From scuba equipment or snorkel rental, to guided dives and instruction, there is something for everyone. ¬† ¬† ¬† Services
  • PADI Beginner Courses
  • PADI Core SCUBA Certifications
  • PADI Specialties
  • Discover SCUBA Diving
  • Technical Level Courses (Click here for more information)
  • Guided Diving (Shore and Boat)
  • Guided Snorkeling
  • Equipment Rentals and Sales
  • Equipment Servicing and Tank Fills (Click here for more information)
Diving St. Croix

St. Croix is home to miles of healthy reef that blankets the north, west and east sides of the island. There are more than 50 dive sites scattered around the north and west sides of the island. Simply put, the island has very diverse diving. Along the North Shore there is wall diving. The West End has 5 shipwrecks, the pier, and reef diving. Finally, there is Buck Island which offers wonderful snorkeling and a relaxing atmosphere.

Shore diving is very popular on St. Croix due to the accessibility and quality of the dive sites. We offer guided shore dives to a number of different dive sites. Our guided dives have an average group size of 3:1, three divers to one divemaster, to keep the focus on you and your enjoyment. We also try to keep divers of the same skill level grouped together to avoid divers feeling pressured into diving past their limits. These are some of the popular shore dives on St. Croix: Cane Bay, Davis Bay Wall (Carambola House Reef), Northstar, and Frederiksted Pier.

The boat diving on St. Croix is split into West End and North Shore dive sites. On the West End the notable sites are the Butler Bay Shipwrecks, Sprat Hall, Armageddon, BK, and Aquarium. On the North Shore some notable sites are Salt River Canyon, WAPA, Turquoise Bay, Love Shack, and Long Reef. Our boat dives are conducted utilizing St. Croix's Ultimate Blue Water Adventure's dive boats. We believe in personalizing our dive experiences, and we offer a personal dive guide when diving off of their boats to keep our small group feel.

post_content:
[wpbb post:title]

Join us to experience tailored diving with a dedicated crew all while escaping the scuba crowds! Diving is our PASSION. The best way we can share that is through our personalized service and 6-diver maximum group dives by boat or by shore to the 30+ dive sites along the entire west end and at The Wall. Not a diver? Check out our guided snorkel tours at the Frederiksted Pier or Boat Charters for Snorkeling, Fishing and Sunset Cruises.


Location: Frederiksted
Phone: (340) 227-1915

Visit Website

About Us
Services
Private Charters
Videos
Map
About Us

At Nep2une, it's our small group tours and experienced crew that makes all the difference. AVOID the crowds with our 6-diver max boat and shore dives. And private or semi-private scuba training dives through SSI, PADI & SDI. We are a full service shop, which means we do all the heavy lifting; from setting up and washing your gear everyday, to photographing that turtle encounter!

Not a certified diver NO PROBLEM!! Our experienced instructors can take you on a Try Dive at the best dive site in St Croix, the Frederiksted Pier! If you're not ready for diving, check out our guided snorkel tours. We strive to give you an experience you will want to come back to year after year.

We are open daily from 8AM-5PM. Located just around the corner from the Frederiksted Pier. See the fun we are having on Instagram and Facebook. And hear what other divers say about us on TripAdvisor!

Services

You CAN have it all when you dive with Nep2une! Our full service retail store has well maintained diving and snorkeling rental gear, tank air fills, souvenirs, & cold drinks! The Nep2une Crew are certified SSI, PADI and SDI professionals, and offer scuba courses from beginner to professional, plus customized photography and specialty courses.

If you are NEW TO SCUBA, check out our Try Diving/Basic Diver program! No experience is needed because our Instructors will guide you through the entire experience while exploring the best dive site on the island, the Frederiksted Pier! You can also add a 1-tank afternoon boat to your morning pier dive & make it a full day adventure. Friends or family members who are certified divers can sign up to join this dive!

  • Advance reservations are required
  • Daily 6-diver max boat dives
  • Private charters for diving, fishing, snorkeling & sunset cruises
  • Guided snorkel tours at the Frederiksted Pier
  • Guided shore dives at the Frederiksted Pier and The Wall
  • Night dives by boat or shore of the Frederiksted Pier, Wrecks & Reefs
  • Try Diving (no experience needed)
  • SSI, PADI & SDI scuba certifications from Open Water to Divemaster
  • Private and Semi Private scuba courses available
  • Daily rentals of diving and snorkeling gear
  • Tank air fills
  • Online reservations and availability calendar

Private Charters

Do you want the entire boat all to yourself? We offer PRIVATE half day and full day charters for scuba diving, snorkeling, fishing charters or custom charters. Chartered guests are welcome to use complimentary scuba or snorkeling gear at no additional cost. Maximum passenger count of six with our Crew.

Don't forget that the best place to see the sunset and sightsee the west end is from our boat on our private 1-hour cruise of the west end. Snacks and beverages included! It's perfect for celebrating any special occasion or popping The Question!
